verses.roman:
ucca kari' gāya gīta, deya karatāli
mṛdaṅga-karatāla-śabde karṇe lāge tāli

synonyms: ucca—loud; kari'-making; gāya—sings; gīta—songs; deya—practices; karatāli—clapping; mṛdaṅga—mṛdaṅga drum; karatāla—hand cymbals; śabde—by sounds; karṇe—in the ear; lāge—there is; tāli—blocking.
translation: " 'Now He loudly sings all kinds of songs, clapping, playing drums and hand cymbals, and making a tumultuous sound that deafens our ears.
